alert.note: Alert for Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 2:06PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette and east central Taylor Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 205 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Perry, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Pinland, Cooks Hammock, Smith, Carbur, Athena, San Pedro Junction and Fenholloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
